title: Google\Cloud\Retail\V2\SearchResponse\Facet\FacetValue
name: FacetValue
description:
A facet value which contains value names and their count.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.retail.v2.SearchResponse.Facet.FacetValue

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.value
params.description: Text value of a facet, such as "Black" for facet "colorFamilies".

params.name: data.interval
params.description: Interval value for a facet, such as [10, 20) for facet "price".

params.name: data.count
params.description: Number of items that have this facet value.

params.name: data.min_value
params.description: The minimum value in the [FacetValue.interval][google.cloud.retail.v2.SearchResponse.Facet.FacetValue.interval]. Only supported on numerical facets and returned if [SearchRequest.FacetSpec.FacetKey.return_min_max][google.cloud.retail.v2.SearchRequest.FacetSpec.FacetKey.return_min_max] is true.

params.name: data.max_value
params.description: The maximum value in the [FacetValue.interval][google.cloud.retail.v2.SearchResponse.Facet.FacetValue.interval]. Only supported on numerical facets and returned if [SearchRequest.FacetSpec.FacetKey.return_min_max][google.cloud.retail.v2.SearchRequest.FacetSpec.FacetKey.return_min_max] is true.
